topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Applying the Ceilometer Patch

body.p: After installing, HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, the Ceilometer client does not support multiple regions.
You should have downloaded the patch files in the Prerequisites.

ol.li: Log in to the lifecycle manager host.

Copy the patch files to the <cloudname> directory. cp hoscg-patchCG-1345.patch hoscg-patchCG-1345.tar.gz ~/<cloudname>
Where <cloudname> is the name of your cloud.

Execute the following command to install tha patch:patch -p0 < ~/<cloudname>/hoscg-patchCG-1345.patch
Where <cloudname> is the name of your cloud.

Change to the <cloudname> directory.
Where <cloudname> is the name of your cloud.
Execute the following command to install the patch:hpatch -c <cloud_name> -f <failure_zone> hoscg-patchCG-1345.tar.gz
Repeat the command to install the patch to each failure zone.
Optionally, remove the patch file to save storage space:rm -f hoscg-patchCG-1345.patch hoscg-patchCG-1345.tar.gz

body.p: To see the log of the patch process, see hoscg-patchCG-1345.user_guide.
